name: Delete All Comments in One Click for Free With / Without Hyperlink Option
author: Sourabh Nagori

sections.description:
Delete All Comments in One Click for Free With / Without Hyperlink Option is a powerful yet user-friendly plugin that allows you to easily manage and delete comments from your WordPress blog posts. With enhanced features and a professional interface, this plugin offers more control over the comment deletion process.

Features:

  • Simple and intuitive interface in the WordPress admin area.
  • Option to delete all comments or only comments without hyperlinks.
  • One-click deletion process with confirmation for safety.
  • Resets comment counts on all posts automatically.
  • Secure implementation with nonce verification.
  • Developed by Sourabh Nagori, an experienced WordPress developer.

Warning: Comment deletion is an irreversible action. Always backup your database before using this plugin.

sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/delete-all-comments-in-one-click directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Navigate to “Enhanced Delete Comments” in the admin menu.
  4. Choose your deletion option and click the “Delete All Comments” button.
sections.faq:
Is this action reversible?

No, deleting comments is an irreversible action. Always backup your database before using this plugin.

Who can use this plugin to delete comments?

Only users with the ‘manage_options’ capability (typically administrators) can access and use this plugin.

What’s the difference between deleting with and without hyperlinks?

The “without hyperlinks” option will only delete comments that do not contain HTML anchor tags (). This can be useful if you want to preserve comments with external links.

Will this plugin affect my posts in any way?

The plugin only deletes comments and resets comment counts. It does not modify the content of your posts.
